HRRR in Zarr Format#

Select parts of the HRRR archive are available in Zarr format in the s3://hrrrzarr bucket on AWS developed by Taylor Gowan and managed by the MesoWest group at the University of Utah. Herbie doesnâ€™t download this type of data yet, but might in the future. For more information about HRRR-Zarr, read the documentation.

To get started check out these notebooks:

  • Taylor Gowan: HRRR-Zarr examples

  • Kevin Tyle: HRRR-Zarr AMS Short Course

I havenâ€™t added Zarr functionality into Herbie, but I started to explore the capability. Here is my sandbox notebookâ€¦ - Brian Blaylock: HRRR-Zarr sandbox
